title: Encouraging Your Child's Dreams
itunes:author: Guest: Shelia Erwin
itunes:summary:
As a parent, it's fun to see your child dream about who he or she wants to become. But what do you do when a child's dream doesn't work out? John and Danny discuss how to be an encouragement to your son or daughter even when his or her dream falls apart. Featuring Shelia Erwin.

Find us online at focusonthefamily.com/parentingpodcast, or call 1-800-A-FAMILY.

Get Shelia's book "Raising Up Dreamers: Find and Grow Your Child’s God-Given Talents" for your donation of any amount: https://donate.focusonthefamily.com/don-fofp-podcast-2022-03-01?refcd=1324802

Get more episode resources: https://www.focusonthefamily.com/episodes/focus-on-parenting-podcast/encouraging-your-childs-dreams/#featured-resource-cta

Listen Anytime: https://store.focusonthefamily.com/dreaming-with-your-child-digital-download?refcd=1324802

If you've listened to any of our podcasts, please give us your feedback: https://focusonthefamily.com/podcastsurvey/
